name: backbone-lite
description: Give your JS App some Backbone with Models and Events.
author: Jeremy Ashkenas <jeremy@documentcloud.org>

scripts.test: eslint --no-eslintrc -c .eslintrc backbone.js && qunit -c Backbone:backbone.js -d _:test/vendor/underscore.js -t test/model.js test/sync.js test/events.js
